data.name: Dungeon Cleaning Express Demo
data.detailed_description: This early access demo contains first level of Dungeon Cleaning Express - a simple 2D platformer in which player has to remove monsters from dungeons and cellars. Dungeon cleaner uses simple and effective method: bombs.
data.about_the_game: This early access demo contains first level of Dungeon Cleaning Express - a simple 2D platformer in which player has to remove monsters from dungeons and cellars. Dungeon cleaner uses simple and effective method: bombs.
data.short_description: This early access demo contains first level of Dungeon Cleaning Express - a simple 2D platformer in which player has to remove monsters from dungeons and cellars. Dungeon cleaner uses simple and effective method: bombs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Video Card w/ 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
